name: Neon Kata
description:
Neon KataUpdate

The game was way too hard so the V2 download is a more balanced version with a few quality of life improvements.

Summary

You are a robot fighting against waves of frogs and bombs.

After each wave you are offered a choice between 3 upgrades, but beware each upgrade also holds a sacrifice.

Controls

WASD to Move
LMB to Shoot
RMB to Aim
SHIFT to Sprint
R to Reload
